description: Conversational wizard and prompts generator with zero dependencies.
name: wizardy

scripts.changelog:commit: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "docs: updated CHANGELOG.md"
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.fix: npm run fix:other && npm run fix:js && npm run fix:ts
scripts.lint: npm run lint:types && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:other && npm run lint:ts
scripts.postversion: git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.preversion: git pull && npm run && npm run test && npm run dist
scripts.release:major: generate-changelog -M -x "chore,docs,refactor,style,test" && npm run changelog:commit && npm version major
scripts.release:minor: generate-changelog -m -x "chore,docs,refactor,style,test" && npm run changelog:commit && npm version minor
scripts.release:patch: generate-changelog -p -x "chore,docs,refactor,style,test" && npm run changelog:commit && npm version patch
